formulas.description:
test 1: {!FormulaPreferredDateTime}+({!var_WorkTypeData.EstimatedDuration}/24)
End time needs to be beginning of time slot + duration + hours between time slots, (e.g. 07:00-12:00 would be 5 hours)
formulas.name: Formula_WO_EndTime

Group: {!var_GroupSelected}

R2 Rate: {!var_R2_5_to_8_Mon_Fri_Amount}

fields.name: DTxtPaymentNotification
fields.fieldText:
Payment will be required upon completion of this attendance. You can pay the operative with card, cash or cheque.


If payment is not made on site. Payment will be processed from the card you provide, by our office following the attendance.
